ygData.subject: httpclient bug
ygData.msgSnippet: Looking through the logs of Heritrix triple-crawl crawl I found a lot of HttpClient errors: WARNING: org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpRecoverableException:

Looking through the logs of Heritrix triple-crawl crawl I found a lot 
of HttpClient errors:
	WARNING: org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpRecoverableException: 
org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpRecoverableException: Error in parsing
 the status  line from the response: unable to find line starting with 
"HTTP/"

I lookup for some pointers at the Commons-HttpClient mailing list and it 
seems that is a bug in httpclient.
See:
http://archives.apache.org/eyebrowse/ReadMsg?listId=128&msgNo=2594
 
For www.bnf.fr site this happens in 1 out of 3 fetch attempts.

i.

P.S. With GET I get correct response line from bnf's web server.
